thumb.title: Sing for You／RUHIA feat.Liam
thumb.description: こんばんはRUHIAです。ボカロック投稿祭今年も参加します。割りとロックンロールかも★イラスト：やかずのきじさん（https://piapro.jp/t/eANM ）★作詞・作曲：RUHIAbaby, why are you crying ? look up the sky. Even though such a sunny day When you cry I feel sad too.smile again in this wonderful world. open your eyes, open your mind , look at me and sing together we can fly in the sky right now feel your soul flying let's accept difficult things and let's grow up feel my soul flying always be by your side and singing for you open your eyes open your mind, look at me and sing together we can change in this world just now feel your soul flying let's accept difficult things and let's grow up feel my soul flying always be by your side and protect you feel your soul shouting let's accept difficult things and let's grow up feel my soul shouting always be by your side and singing for you I'm singing for you I'm singing for you
